section.title: Opening Query Results View
section.para: Query Results View shows Query test result performed at setting Query through Query Test Editor. You can open Query Results View through the following ways.

listitem.para: Select Query Results at "Window > Show View > Other..."

section.title: Utilizing Query Results View
section.para: As Query Results View shows Query test result performed at setting Query through Query Test Editor, it is possible to check the result and modify query statement in advance.
